49 
50 
51 double DebyeHuckleEvaluator::operator() (double T, CoulombType type)
52 {
53  // Check input data
54  assert(T >= 0.0);
55  assert(type != N_TABLE_TYPES);
56 
57  // Average closest impact parameter
58  const double b = QE*QE / (8.0*PI*EPS0*KB*T);
59 
60  // Clip maximum lambda
61  m_lambda = std::min(m_lambda, 2.0*sm_tstvec[N_TST_POINTS-1]*b);
62 
63  // Check if we need to update the values
64  if (std::abs(T-m_last_T) + std::abs(m_lambda-m_last_lambda) > 1.0e-10) {
65  // Reduced temperature
66  const double Tst = std::max(0.5*m_lambda/b, sm_tstvec[0]);
67 
68  // Interpolate the table using reduced temperature
69  interpolate(Tst);
70 
71  // Convert from reduced form
72  m_values.head(BST_ATT) *= PI*m_lambda*m_lambda/(Tst*Tst);
73 
74  // Save last updated state
75  m_last_T = T;
76  m_last_lambda = m_lambda;
77  }
78 
79  switch (type) {
80  // Derived data from the tabulated ones
81  case Q12_ATT: return m_values[CST_ATT]*m_values[Q11_ATT];
82  case Q12_REP: return m_values[CST_REP]*m_values[Q11_REP];
83  case Q13_ATT: return m_values[Q11_ATT]*(1.25*m_values[CST_ATT]-0.25*m_values[BST_ATT]);
84  case Q13_REP: return m_values[Q11_REP]*(1.25*m_values[CST_REP]-0.25*m_values[BST_REP]);
85  case Q23_ATT: return m_values[EST_ATT]*m_values[Q22_ATT];
86  case Q23_REP: return m_values[EST_REP]*m_values[Q22_REP];
87  case AST_ATT: return m_values[Q22_ATT]/m_values[Q11_ATT];
88  case AST_REP: return m_values[Q22_REP]/m_values[Q11_REP];
89  // Tabulated data
90  default: return m_values[type];
91  }
92 }
93 
94 
95 void DebyeHuckleEvaluator::setDebyeLength(double Te, double ne)
96 {
97  assert(Te >= 0.0);
98  assert(ne >= 0.0);
99 
100  // Protect against small electron number densities
101  ne = std::max(ne, 1.0e-16);
102 
103  // Including electron and ion contributions
104  m_lambda = std::sqrt(0.5*EPS0*KB*Te/(ne*QE*QE));
105 }
106 
107 void DebyeHuckleEvaluator::interpolate(double Tst)
108 {
109  // Clip to table boundaries
110  if (Tst <= sm_tstvec[0])
111  m_values = sm_table.row(0);
112  else if (Tst >= sm_tstvec[N_TST_POINTS-1])
113  m_values = sm_table.row(N_TST_POINTS-1);
114  else {
115  // Find the index to interpolate between
116  int i = 1; while (sm_tstvec[i] < Tst) ++i;
117 
118  // Interpolate
119  m_values = (sm_table.row(i)-sm_table.row(i-1))*(Tst-sm_tstvec[i])/
120  (sm_tstvec(i)-sm_tstvec(i-1)) + sm_table.row(i);
121  }
122 }
123 
124 
125 // Initialize the T* index values
126 Array<double, N_TST_POINTS, 1> init_tstvec() {
127  Array<double, N_TST_POINTS, 1> vec; vec <<
128  0.1, 0.2, 0.3, 0.4, 0.6, 0.8, 1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0, 6.0, 8.0,
129  10.0, 20.0, 30.0, 40.0, 60.0, 80.0, 100.0, 200.0, 300.0, 400.0, 600.0, 800.0,
130  1.0e3, 1.0e4;
131  return vec;
132 }
133 Array<double, N_TST_POINTS, 1> DebyeHuckleEvaluator::sm_tstvec = init_tstvec();
134

169 Array<double, N_TST_POINTS, N_TABLE_TYPES, ColMajor>
170  DebyeHuckleEvaluator::sm_table = init_table();
171 
176 class DebyeHuckleColInt : public CollisionIntegral
177 {
178 public:
179 
184  DebyeHuckleColInt(CollisionIntegral::ARGS args) :
185  CollisionIntegral(args)
186  {
187  assert(args.pair.type() == ATTRACTIVE || args.pair.type() == REPULSIVE);
188 
189  // Set the type of integral we need
190  string kind = args.kind;
191  CollisionType type = args.pair.type();
192 
193  if (kind == "Q11")
194  m_type = (type == ATTRACTIVE ? Q11_ATT : Q11_REP);
195  else if (kind == "Q12")
196  m_type = (type == ATTRACTIVE ? Q12_ATT : Q12_REP);
197  else if (kind == "Q13")
198  m_type = (type == ATTRACTIVE ? Q13_ATT : Q13_REP);
199  else if (kind == "Q14")
200  m_type = (type == ATTRACTIVE ? Q14_ATT : Q14_REP);
201  else if (kind == "Q15")
202  m_type = (type == ATTRACTIVE ? Q15_ATT : Q15_REP);
203  else if (kind == "Q22")
204  m_type = (type == ATTRACTIVE ? Q22_ATT : Q22_REP);
205  else if (kind == "Q23")
206  m_type = (type == ATTRACTIVE ? Q23_ATT : Q23_REP);
207  else if (kind == "Q24")
208  m_type = (type == ATTRACTIVE ? Q24_ATT : Q24_REP);
209  else if (kind == "Ast")
210  m_type = (type == ATTRACTIVE ? AST_ATT : AST_REP);
211  else if (kind == "Bst")
212  m_type = (type == ATTRACTIVE ? BST_ATT : BST_REP);
213  else if (kind == "Cst")
214  m_type = (type == ATTRACTIVE ? CST_ATT : CST_REP);
215  else
216  args.xml.parseError(
217  "Invalid collision integral for Debye-Huckle integral.");
218  }
219 
220  // Set the Debye length
221  void getOtherParams(const class Thermodynamics& thermo) {
222  sm_evaluator.setDebyeLength(
223  thermo.Te(),
224  thermo.hasElectrons() ? thermo.numberDensity()*thermo.X()[0] : 0.0);
225  };
226 
227 private:
228 
229  double compute_(double T) { return sm_evaluator(T, m_type); }
230 
234  bool isEqual(const CollisionIntegral& ci) const {
235  const DebyeHuckleColInt& compare =
236  dynamic_cast<const DebyeHuckleColInt&>(ci);
237  return (m_type == compare.m_type);
238  }
239 
240 private:
241 
242  CoulombType m_type;
243  static DebyeHuckleEvaluator sm_evaluator;
244 
245 }; // class CoulombColInt
246 
247 // Initialization of the DebyeHuckleEvaluator
248 DebyeHuckleEvaluator DebyeHuckleColInt::sm_evaluator;
249 
250 // Register the "Debye-Huckle" CollisionIntegral
251 ObjectProvider<DebyeHuckleColInt, CollisionIntegral> DebyeHuckle_ci("Debye-Huckel");
